title: Nissan MCP1F2A20LV 4000 Lb Capacity Propane Forklift
item_description:
Nissan MCP1F2A20LV 4000 Lb Capacity Propane Forklift

  • Manufacturer: Nissan
  • Model: MCP1F2A20LV
  • Load Capacity: 4000lb
  • Fuel Type: Propane
  • Mast Type: Two Stage
  • Hour Meter Reads: 10673
  • Truck Weight: 7175Lbs
  • Tire Type: Solid Rubber
  • Number of Front Tires: 2
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2
  • Rear Tire Size: 16x6x11-1/2
  • Maximum Lift Height: 80”
  • Fork Length: 48”
  • Engine: Nissan
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes
  • Operational: Yes (See Video)
  • Function test (Pass, See Video)
    • Driving forward and backward
    • Turning right and left
    • Tilting up and down
    • Shifting right and left
    • Fork positioning in and out
    • Mast traveling up and down.
  • Features:
    • Side Shift
    • Tilt
    • Hydraulic fork positioner
